snippet.title: Unlock The Magic: Remastered LEGO Harry Potter Collection | Back to Hogwarts
snippet.description:
What better way to go back to Hogwarts than with the remastered LEGO Harry Potter Collection? Experience the adventure all over again as you battle the basilisk, compete in the Triwizard Tournament and take part in the Battle of Hogwarts with enhanced graphics and 4k resolution.

Available Tuesday 8th October, 2024 on PS5, Xbox Series X|S and Steam.

The Harry Potter: Complete 8-Film Collection is available on Blu-ray and Digital now.

SUBSCRIBE ➡️ http://wizarding.world/6008yCNUA

Join the Harry Potter Fan Club and get sorted into your Hogwarts house, let the wand choose you and discover your Patronus at http://wizardingworld.com/
